docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 27 -- The Chaco peace negotiations were at a standstill today as the League of Nations commission awaited the acceptance by Bolivia and Paraguay of its telegraphic request that their armistice be extended to midnight Jan. 14.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 27 -- The Chaco peace negotiations were at a standstill today as the League of Nations commission awaited the acceptance by Bolivia and Paraguay of its telegraphic request that their armistice be extended to midnight Jan. 14.
docs.abstract: Bolivia accepts truce extension; no reply from Paraguay; Bolivia makes new charge of armistice violation; Pres Terra receives peacemakers

headline.main: BOLIVIA ACCEPTS TRUCE EXTENSION; But League Group Gets No Reply From Paraguay on Renewal to Jan. 14. LA PAZ AGAIN AN ACCUSER Charges Foe Has Surrounded a Fort Since Armistice -- Terra Receives Peacemakers.

byline.original: From a Staff Correspondent.Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28 -- "If there ever was any fear of the United States in South America it has completely disappeared as a result of Secretary Hull's activities at the Seventh Pan-American Conference here," President Gabriel Terra of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28 -- "If there ever was any fear of the United States in South America it has completely disappeared as a result of Secretary Hull's activities at the Seventh Pan-American Conference here," President Gabriel Terra of Uruguay told this correspondent this afternoon.
docs.abstract: Hull's armistice aid praised by Pres Terra; Paraguay refuses to extend truce

headline.main: TERRA HAILS GAINS OF HULL FOR PEACE; Uruguay's President Asserts He Ended South America's Old Fear of Us. SAYS HE GUIDED PARLEY Paraguay Refuses to Extend the Truce With Bolivia Obtained by Terra. TERRA HAILS GAINS OF HULL FOR PEACE

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE.Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES.By JOHN W. WHITE

headline.main: Mr. Rogers Is Satisfied With the Latest Parley

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28 -- Paraguay refused today to agree to an extension of the armistice with Bolivia until Jan. 14, thereby completely changing the entire aspect of the Chaco war question.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28 -- Paraguay refused today to agree to an extension of the armistice with Bolivia until Jan. 14, thereby completely changing the entire aspect of the Chaco war question.

headline.main: PARAGUAY REFUSES TO EXTEND TRUCE; Says Armistice Aids Bolivia in Reforming Lines After Being Driven Back. NEGOTIATORS PESSIMISTIC League Delegates at Montevideo Work Hard, However, to Save Peace at Last Moment.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: PANAMA, Dec. 27. -- Kidnapping is not confined to the United States or other civilized countries. The savage Indians who inhabit the Goajira Peninsula in Colombia have some abvanced ideas on the subject, according to discoveries made by the Weston...
docs.lead_paragraph: PANAMA, Dec. 27. -- Kidnapping is not confined to the United States or other civilized countries. The savage Indians who inhabit the Goajira Peninsula in Colombia have some abvanced ideas on the subject, according to discoveries made by the Weston Carr Expedition now engaged in exploring this little-known region of Colombia.

headline.main: KIDNAPPING KNOWN TO GOAJIRA INDIANS; In Colombia, However, Fate of Captives Is Less Vital Than Hurt to Tribal Pride. MONKS RANSOM SOME Capuchin Fathers Stretch Slen- der Resources to Save Chil- dren From Execution.

byline.original: Special Correspondence, THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 30. -- The Chaco situation darkened again today in view of Paraguay's refusal to continue the peace negotiations until the League of Nations commission provides guarantees against the renewal of hostilities by Bolivia.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 30. -- The Chaco situation darkened again today in view of Paraguay's refusal to continue the peace negotiations until the League of Nations commission provides guarantees against the renewal of hostilities by Bolivia.
docs.abstract: Outlook for peace darkens; members of League bd try to moderate Paraguayan stand

headline.main: OUTLOOK FOR PEACE IN CHACO DARKENS; Members of League Board Off to Asuncion in Effort to Moderate Paraguayan Stand.
